item.title: Deadpool Kills the Marvel Universe (2011 - 2012)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/deadpool-kills-marvel-universe.webp'); } Deadpool Kills the Marvel Universe. It is here that Dr. Benjamin Brighton has introduced radical new treatments designed to ease troubled minds… and turn malicious souls toward the pursuit of peace. DEADPOOL. item.title: Animal Man (1988 - 1995)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/morrison-animal-man.jpeg'); } Animal Man. Grant Morrison. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . dc.fandom.com . 1988. Accessed Mar 5, 2023. Snapshots He took himself into the desert. And rose up. And went into the presence of God. And God spoke unto Crafty saying, “You must be punished for this rebellion against my will. Nevertheless, I am a good God and my judgment will be tempered with mercy.
